page.title: 12Transport
page.content: There are three main transport systems in our area: M6 motorway, A6 main road & railway. The 6 lane wide M6 was opened 20 years ago and runs N-S. During one hour we counted 666 commercial & 642 private vehicles going S with 582 com. & 714 private going N. The A6 parallels the M6. It carries up to 1,400 cars to the Univ. each week day. The railway was electrified in 1974. There are now more passengers because of students travelling to the University. The speed of the Advanced Passenger Train reaches 125 miles per hour on this stretch. There are 142 passenger trains and 75 freight trains on this line each week. The freight trains carry 1,000 tons each and average 75 mph, while the inter-city passenger trains average 100 mph.
